None.Name: Ice Shield
None.Description:
Every 11 seconds, unit is
able to cast an Ice Shield on a
friendly unit that absorbs up to 520
damage for 20 seconds.

None.Name: Revenant's Doom
None.Description:
Activate to bestow the unit with a curse that will make it resurrect in case it dies. The resurrected revenant will only be a shadow of its former self but it will be endowed with the same abilities
and equal in strength. After 20 seconds the revenant will then die once and for all. May only be triggered once.

None.Name: Blessed Breeze
None.Description: The unit is surrounded by a frosty breeze in a 15m radius around it all friendlyentities deal 25% more damage against frozen units.
